authorCredential.translatedString: Staff Engineer, Space Robotics at MDA Corporation (1995-present)

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "As a Canadian would you consider moving to the United States? Why or why not?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

credentials.translatedString: lives in Canada and the United States of America (1959-present)

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "That would be a big Ontario sized no for me. If I was American, I would say a Texas sized no, but since I'm Canadian, and Ontario is 50% larger than Texas, an Ontario sized no is far more appropriate.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Reasons are Canada has:", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Lack of Canadian gun culture. I've lived all over, I currently live outside Canadas largest city, and I have no problem walking alone anywhere at any time of day. I don't bother locking the doors at night. I've never been robbed or mugged. And outside of hunting rifles or on a police officer, I've never seen a gun, nor heard one fired, nor know anyone that owns one. And I like it thay way.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Universal health care. It's not perfect, but no system is. I don't have to worry about the cost of health care if I lose my job, or have to deal with any heath insurance, deductibles, co pays or medical bills of any kind.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Lack of religion in politics. It would be unthinkable for the prime minister to have a prayer session with cabinet like is so often shown in the US. That would end their political career. Politics and religion should be completely separate.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Efficient elections. 10 weeks and it's over. In the US it goes on for YEARS, and it costs about $6 BILLION every two years. That's nuts.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Comparative lack of racism. Not saying there is no racism in Canada, there is. But it's at a whole different level in the US and I don't want to raise my kids in that environment.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Love to visit, and the people are great. But no interest in living there.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
